name: Super Company
description:
Super Company is a strategic management game that simulates the development of enterprises. You will play an entrepreneur in the 1990s, running your own company in a poor small town, producing all kinds of goods needed by small town residents, from food to cars; It can also build houses and schools to provide residential and educational services for citizens; It can also carry out international trade through ports and earn foreign exchange for industrial upgrading. You should choose appropriate development strategies, plan various development routes, and strive to develop the company into a super enterprise with extensive business.

Earn Your First Pot Of Gold



You will start from agriculture, establish a planting farm or a breeding farm, and sell milk, fruit and meat to small town residents. You will get the first cash income; Some raw materials, such as leather, corn, cotton and so on, cannot be sold directly to small town residents. You can export them through the port, and you will get the first foreign exchange income; Of course, you can also set up various factories and process them into food, clothing, etc. required by the residents of the factories.

Diversified Operation



Your goal is to develop the company into a super enterprise, so diversification is essential.

There will be 9 types of subsidiaries in the game, including agriculture, food industry, mining industry, energy and chemical industry, clothing industry, household goods industry, electronics industry, automobile industry and real estate industry.

There will be 88 kinds of goods, 43 kinds of consumer goods needed by small town residents, 45 kinds of raw materials and semi-finished products in the game.

Multiple Development Strategies



How do you decide the development priorities of different subsidiaries?

How do you plan the transportation route between factories?

How do you spend every foreign exchange income? Buy patents to develop new industries or train more highly educated talents to improve factory efficiency?

The population of a small town will affect the demand for goods. How will you attract more people? Can we produce enough goods? Or reduce the rent?

Do you have the potential to be an excellent entrepreneur? Can the company succeed under your leadership? Come and have a try!!!
